intro: Zollingeria borneensis, commonly known as the Bornean zollingeria, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenia plants. The plant is characterized by its attractive, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale pink. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understorey of tropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
